title: GTM Strategy & Launch
description: The blueprint for a successful Web3 launch. From tokenomics to user acquisition.
longDescription: We craft bespoke Go To Market strategies for blockchain protocols and dApps. Our data driven approach ensures you reach your target users and liquidity providers effectively through every phase of launch.

process.title: Incentive Modeling
process.description: Simulating tokenomics to ensure long term sustainability.

process.title: Alpha Seeding
process.description: Building a core group of early adopters and LPs.

process.title: Mainnet Launch
process.description: Orchestrating high impact community events and liquidity events.

process.title: Post Launch Growth
process.description: Scaling adoption through ecosystem grants and rewards.

title: Community Building & Management
description: Cultivate a loyal army of advocates on Discord, Telegram, and Lens.
longDescription: A strong community is the bedrock of Web3. We specialize in building and managing active communities with a focus on retention and technical support. No bots, just real humans. AI monitored for safety.

process.title: Culture Design
process.description: Establishing value aligned community norms and lore.

process.title: Tooling Setup
process.description: Implementing anti bot measures and gamified reward systems.

process.title: Active Moderation
process.description: 24/7 global support and engagement from native Web3 experts.

process.title: Conversion
process.description: Turning passive members into active protocol participants.

title: Public Relations (PR)
description: Global media coverage in top blockchain and mainstream tech publications.
longDescription: We tell your story to the world. Our PR team has direct lines to journalists at Cointelegraph, Blockworks, TechCrunch, and more, ensuring your announcements have maximum impact.

process.title: Narrative Building
process.description: Crafting a compelling vertical for institutional and retail audiences.

process.title: Media Pitching
process.description: Direct outreach to top tier journalists in our global network.

process.title: Syndication
process.description: Ensuring your news is picked up by secondary and technical outlets.

process.title: Brand Moat Building
process.description: Ongoing thought leadership to cement your status as an industry leader.

title: Web3 Growth Marketing
description: Full funnel growth strategies designed for the decentralized user journey.
longDescription: Growth in Web3 requires a unique approach to user attribution and incentives. We use proprietary data tools to track on chain and off chain behavior to optimize your growth engine.

process.title: On Chain Analysis
process.description: Identifying and targeting high value user profiles by wallet behavior.

process.title: Incentive Funnels
process.description: Designing quest based onboarding that leads to actual protocol use.

process.title: Retention Loops
process.description: Using governance and social layers to keep users in the ecosystem.

process.title: TVL Optimization
process.description: Fine tuning liquidity incentives for maximum capital efficiency.

title: Targeted PPC (Reddit & Native)
description: PPC on Reddit, Twitter, and major blockchain native ad networks.
longDescription: Reach your audience where they hang out. We manage high performance ad campaigns on Reddit, X, and blockchain native networks like Coingecko, Etherscan, and Coinmarketcap.

process.title: Audience Slicing
process.description: Segmenting by subreddit, X community, and on chain activity.

process.title: Native Content Design
process.description: Creating ad assets that blend in with community culture.

process.title: Bid Engineering
process.description: Optimizing specifically for low CPA in expensive Web3 niches.

process.title: Conversion Tracking
process.description: Custom solutions for tracking wallet connections via paid traffic.

title: KOL & Influencer Marketing
description: Partner with the most trusted voices in the Web3 ecosystem.
longDescription: Connect with top tier Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) who can authentically promote your project. We handle selection, vetting, negotiation, and performance tracking to ensure high ROI partnerships.

process.title: Vetting & Tiering
process.description: Selecting KOLs with real engagement and domain authority.

process.title: Briefing
process.description: Ensuring the message is authentic while hitting key value props.

process.title: Launch Phase
process.description: Coordinating simultaneous drops for maximum trending potential.

process.title: Performance Tracking
process.description: Detailed reporting on reach, engagement, and conversion.
